description: This source file implements platform-dependent and utility functions for the Daemon Socket TCP object within the Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC). It primarily contains a factory function to create a new Daemon Socket TCP object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateDaemonSocketTcp(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ANSC Daemon Socket TCP object using the internal factory function 'AnscDktoCreate'.
